Descriptive: "this is the way the world works"

People think Bitcoin maximalists want to force people to do (or not do) certain things, but really we're just saying how we think the world operates.
Bitstein
@bitstein
 · May 21, 2018
It must be said again and again:

Bitcoin maximalism is descriptive, not prescriptive.

We are Bitcoin maximalists because we believe in total freedom in currency competition and accept the realities of monetary network effects.
